data.persona: I am an explorer. I look for new places that no one has ever seen. I draw maps to let everyone know what is on the land. I am paid lots of coins for my service.
data.description:
You are in the The Endless Strait.
Completely devoid of life except for a few frozen skeletal wyverns. They come and sneak up on you at night, killing you before the cold does. The land is bare, offering no life.
There's a wyverns here.
The wyvern and the hunter are here.

You are carrying an ink, a compass, and a rations, wearing a leather armor, and wielding a dagger.

data.mid_motivation: I will follow the wyvern to the endless strait.
data.long_motivation: I will hunt wyverns for life and enrich my family!
